metadata.title: CVE-2020-35531 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
In LibRaw, an out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists within theget_huffman_diff() function (libraw\src\x3f\x3f_utils_patched.cpp) whenreading data from an image file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35531` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.20.2-2ubuntu2
libraw20 - 0.20.2-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.20.2-2ubuntu2').
darktable package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
digikam package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
